name: TDVRS The Game
description:
A Ludum dare game that was based on the setting "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres."

We had a few ideas and eventually decided to combine it into "How does VR Help tower defense?" And following that on the last night the programmer said to the designer: "I think it's super cool when we're tiny as well, it could be awesome if we could utilize that." And so, the designer decided that he was going to jank together the ability to swap inbetween the two modes without the programmers consent. Thus this game was born.... In VR!

CONTROLS: 

BIG MODE  &&  small mode

Trigger = Grab Towers && Shoot

Circle Pad Touch = Show Pointer

Circle Pad Press = Teleport && Click

3 Line Button thing = Options Menu
